data.fullContent: The fashion industry is one of the most versatile in the world. It spans numerous industries and professions, ranging from designers, to garment makers, to people who work in the textile industry. Its history is a long and varied one, dating back as early as the 1940s. Garment designers can take cues from many different eras to create pieces that are unique to their interests, different from historical pieces of clothing, and fashionable. Today, people have a vast supply of different fabrics to choose from when creating outfits.

q1.translation: 时装业是世界上最多才多艺的行业之一。它跨越了许多行业和职业，从设计师，到服装制造商，再到在纺织行业工作的人。
q1.front: The fashion industry is one of the most versatile in the world. It spans numerous industries and professions, ranging from designers, to garment makers, to people who work in the textile industry.
q1.content: The fashion industry is one of the ____ versatile in the ____. It spans numerous industries and professions, ____ from designers, to garment makers, to ____ who work in the textile ____.

q2.translation: 时装业是世界上最多才多艺的行业之一。它跨越了许多行业和职业，从设计师，到服装制造商，再到在纺织行业工作的人。它的历史悠久多样，最早可追溯到20世纪40年代。服装设计师可以从许多不同的时代中寻找灵感，创造出符合他们兴趣的独特服装，既不同于历史服装，又时尚。如今，人们在制作服装时有大量不同的面料可供选择。
q2.front: The fashion industry is one of the most versatile in the world. It spans numerous industries and professions, ranging from designers, to garment makers, to people who work in the textile industry.
q2.middle: Its history is a long and varied one, dating back as early as the 1940s.
q2.ending: Garment designers can take cues from many different eras to create pieces that are unique to their interests, different from historical pieces of clothing, and fashionable. Today, people have a vast supply of different fabrics to choose from when creating outfits.

options.sentence: Its history is a long and varied one, dating back as early as the 1940s.
Clothing was made by tailors, or people who had great sewing skills, or by themselves.
Clothing was more ornate and difficult to produce, but became more expensive.
Around the 16th century, the Japanese textile industry was the first to make clothing.

It spans numerous industries and professions, ranging from designers, to garment makers, to people who work in the textile industry. Its history is a long and varied one, dating back as early as the 1940s. Garment designers can take cues from many different eras to create pieces that are unique to their interests, different from historical pieces of clothing, and fashionable. Today, people have a vast supply of different fabrics to choose from when creating outfits.
q3.questionContent: What are some of the different professions involved in the fashion industry?
q3.selectAnswer: from designers, to garment makers, to people who work in the textile industry
